title: Emoji Charades
notes: Steam lists Shared/Split Screen PvP/Co-op and requires a mobile phone controller app; 8 user reviews. Play mode inferred from description.
raw_comment: Charades type game where you give clues by typing emojis on a phone. “Unlimited” number of players. 1 phone as a controller, the rest participate by guessing the secret word/phrase. Shared screen.
